message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to meet your needs and enhance your daily life. I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120, but I'm open to discussion. Let's start with an offer of $150. I hope we can come to a fair agreement.

I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I was thinking more along the lines of $120, which is the face value of the product. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
